reviewText: Loved the show...had recorded them all on the cable box, but now I've got them FOREVER!  USA network exec's are FOOLS, this was an awesome show.
summary: One of the finest programs ever...and USA network cancelled it after just one season...
Title: Common Law

reviewText: I thought this was a very good and different series. you don't often think of police officers needing therapy. the fact that it was couples therapy made it very funny.
Title: Common Law

reviewText: I missed it when it went off the air. Glad I was able to get it. Will be ordering more movies.
Title: Common Law

reviewText: I was also disappointed to see the show cancelled. I think it could have been great. You laughed when needed and serious when called for. Shame on you USA for giving up. I wondered what would have happened if you would have given up on both NCIS shows.
Title: Common Law

reviewText: Got into the show 1 month or so ago and I love it! I loved Michael Ealy on Almost Human and he is equally as awesome in CL! Warren Kole is great too! I wish that the show was given a chance...it's funny and really teaches you about all different types of relationships! Awesome show! Upset that I got into it late but I'm glad that I did!
Title: Common Law

reviewText: My mother in law loves this show but isn't really shopping online at Amazon so she had asked me to do some checking for her and found it on Amazon cheaper than in stores so it was a no brainer.
summary: My mother in law's favorite show
Title: Common Law
